name: APMA Jumma Masjid
description: APMA Jumma Masjid, located in Kanyakumari district, stands as a symbol of Islamic heritage and community unity. Its distinctive architecture and serene atmosphere attract worshippers and visitors alike, fostering spiritual reflection and cultural exchange.
location: 68X9+7HR, Mosque Street, Chakala, Thuckalay, Tamil Nadu 629175
